unnormalised: Criminal law, eh? More like criminal *bore*, am I right? My neighbour, Sharmaji, got a notice under CrPC 107. Apparently, his loud bhajan sessions at 5 AM were “disturbing the peace”. I told him he should file a counter-complaint for noise pollution... against the morning crows! Adv. Verma is handling the case, charging ₹10,000 per hearing. Sharmaji says if he loses, he's blaming IPC Section 290 and moving to Goa. Good luck finding peace there at 5:00 AM!
